Is this an arguments object? It's a harder question than you think.

## Example

```js
var isArguments = require('is-arguments');
var assert = require('assert');

assert.equal(isArguments({}), false);
assert.equal(isArguments([]), false);
(function () {
	assert.equal(isArguments(argumen
